name: Columbia Molokai III Flips - Men's
description: Incredibly comfortable sandals for recovery days or everyday kicking around. Slip them in your pack to wear around camp after a long day of hiking.Padded strap for irritation free comfort.Supportive FluidFoam™ base supports your archesMouldable footbed adapts to your stride.Non-marking rubber sole with perimeter traction lugs.
